title.name: Wereclaw Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Wereclaw Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">+(24-36)% to Global [[Critical Strike Multiplier]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">It's said to be noble to stand one's ground.<br>To soak the earth in stalwart blood.<br>While the First Ones chose to laugh and run<br>and caper with untamed glee.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Rot Head Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Rot Head Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">1</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(30-40)% increased Fish Bite Sensitivity</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">To catch a big fish you need tempting bait. <br>And there is no fish bigger than the Empire,<br>and no bait as tempting as Ezomyr.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Deep One Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Deep One Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">1</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(20-30)% increased [[Cold Damage]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">We have basked in the cloying warmth of servitude.<br>Now the First Ones harden us<br>against the numbing chill of despair<br>so that freedom will not slip through our trembling fingers.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Deadhand Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Deadhand Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">1</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(19-31)% increased [[Chaos Damage]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The Empire poisons our blood with sweet wine.<br>Poisons our flesh with silk.<br>Poisons our minds with civil lies.<br>Poisons our children with servitude.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Jet Amulet
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Jet Amulet<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Requires Level <em class="tc -value"><em class="tc -value">12</em></em></span><span class="group tc -mod">+(8-12)% to all [[Elemental Resistance|Elemental Resistances]]</span></span></span>

title.name: Fangjaw Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Fangjaw Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(8-12)% increased maximum [[Life]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The First Ones are the forever ones.<br>There is no dust of the hourglass in their blood.<br>No fissures of weariness in their faces.<br>To drink of their blood is to drink of time itself.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Mandible Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Mandible Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">1</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(6-10)% increased [[Attack]] and [[Cast Speed]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The First Ones hold us<br>between two sharpened blades.<br>That should we stray too far from the path,<br>we find ourselves severed.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Ashscale Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Ashscale Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">1</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(20-30)% increased [[Fire Damage]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The fire of the hearth is a docile dog,<br>leashed and tamed.<br>The fire of the First Ones is a ravening wolf,<br>wild and free.<br>- The Wolven King<br></span></span></span>

title.name: Monkey Paw Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Monkey Paw Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">3</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">10% chance to gain an [[Endurance Charge]] on [[Kill]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Look not upon me with fear, my men.<br>Though I seem strange, even monstrous,<br>were you to see with the eyes of your forebears,<br>your hearts would be filled with wonder.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Avian Twins Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Avian Twins Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">50% of [[Cold Damage]] from [[Hit|Hits]] taken as [[Fire Damage]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The first ones live where they can, where they must.<br>They embrace the frost, the storm, the drought.<br>Waxing and waning, breaking and mending,<br>living with time and happenstance, as must we.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Avian Twins Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Avian Twins Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">50% of [[Cold Damage]] from [[Hit|Hits]] taken as [[Lightning Damage]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The first ones live where they can, where they must.<br>They embrace the frost, the storm, the drought.<br>Waxing and waning, breaking and mending,<br>living with time and happenstance, as must we.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Avian Twins Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Avian Twins Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">50% of [[Lightning Damage]] from [[Hit|Hits]] taken as [[Fire Damage]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The first ones live where they can, where they must.<br>They embrace the frost, the storm, the drought.<br>Waxing and waning, breaking and mending,<br>living with time and happenstance, as must we.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Avian Twins Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Avian Twins Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">50% of [[Fire Damage]] from [[Hit|Hits]] taken as [[Lightning Damage]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The first ones live where they can, where they must.<br>They embrace the frost, the storm, the drought.<br>Waxing and waning, breaking and mending,<br>living with time and happenstance, as must we.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Avian Twins Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Avian Twins Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">50% of [[Lightning Damage]] from [[Hit|Hits]] taken as [[Cold Damage]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The first ones live where they can, where they must.<br>They embrace the frost, the storm, the drought.<br>Waxing and waning, breaking and mending,<br>living with time and happenstance, as must we.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Monkey Paw Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Monkey Paw Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">3</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">10% chance to gain a [[Power Charge]] on [[Kill]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Look not upon me with fear, my men.<br>Though I seem strange, even monstrous,<br>were you to see with the eyes of your forebears,<br>your hearts would be filled with wonder.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Monkey Paw Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Monkey Paw Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">3</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">10% chance to gain a [[Frenzy Charge]] on [[Kill]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Look not upon me with fear, my men.<br>Though I seem strange, even monstrous,<br>were you to see with the eyes of your forebears,<br>your hearts would be filled with wonder.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Horned Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Horned Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">Projectiles Pierce 2 additional Targets</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The Empire hides lies and falsehoods<br>Behind a mask of politeness and civility.<br>The First Ones teach us to look through the lies,<br>And that no beast can truly cover their tracks.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Avian Twins Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Avian Twins Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">50% of [[Fire Damage]] from [[Hit|Hits]] taken as [[Cold Damage]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The first ones live where they can, where they must.<br>They embrace the frost, the storm, the drought.<br>Waxing and waning, breaking and mending,<br>living with time and happenstance, as must we.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Stygian Vise
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Stygian Vise<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod">Has 1 Abyssal [[Item socket|Socket]]</span></span></span>

title.name: Greatwolf Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Greatwolf Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">4</em></span><span class="group tc -mod"><Two random talisman implicit modifiers></span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The wolf greeted the king,<br>In the light of the harvest moon.<br>The wolf offered the strength of the wild,<br>And the king paid for it in blood.</span></span></span>

title.name: Breach Ring
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Breach Ring<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod">Properties are doubled while in a Breach</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span></span></span>

title.name: Undying Flesh Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Undying Flesh Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">1</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">+1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">'Sleep when you are weary,' our mothers told us.<br>'Sleep when you are dead,' our fathers told us.<br>To the First Ones, the slumbering and the corpse<br>are one and the same.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Bonespire Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Bonespire Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">1</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(20-30)% increased maximum [[Mana]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The civilised man must wrestle<br>with the demands of heart and mind.<br>The First Ones share no such struggle.<br>For their Spirit is swift and deadly certain.<br>- The Wolven King<br></span></span></span>

title.name: Black Maw Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Black Maw Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">1</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">Has 1 [[Item socket|Socket]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The First Ones stalk with us<br>upon this lifelong hunt,<br>and cast their contempt<br>upon those that would make us their prey.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Spinefuse Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Spinefuse Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">3</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(6-10)% increased Quantity of Items found</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">We Ezomytes are beasts of burden<br>bearing wealth of an empire on our backs,<br>growing lean and strong<br>while our masters grow fat and weak.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Primal Skull Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Primal Skull Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">Regenerate 2% of [[Life]] per second</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">With the will of the first ones in our sinews<br>we shall tear down the walls of Sarn.<br>Yet as is the way of the wildlands,<br>Only the strong may grow stronger.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Longtooth Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Longtooth Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">3</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(4-6)% additional [[Physical Damage]] Reduction</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">We grew contemptuous of our past.<br>Dismissed the first ones as ignorant and wild.<br>We were fools and naive children<br>to turn our backs on our inheritance.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Lone Antler Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Lone Antler Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">1</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(20-30)% increased [[Lightning Damage]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The First Ones thundered over Ezomyr<br>upon hooves of grey and black.<br>The people felt their stamping rage<br>and cowered as the fury rained down.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Three Rat Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Three Rat Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">3</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(12-16)% increased Attributes</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">When we free ourselves from the shackles<br>of civilised existence<br>we learn to feed and run and breathe<br>as the First Ones have always done.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Splitnewt Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Splitnewt Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(4-6)% chance to Freeze, [[Shock]] and [[Ignite]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">From flesh and ferocity,<br>the First Ones roamed<br>through the realm of Spirit,<br>and into the darkness beyond. <br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Clutching Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Clutching Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(15-25)% increased Global Defences</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Fear the children of the First Ones.<br>Let fear shield your back.<br>And let the dullard speak of bravery<br>when the First Ones come for him.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Hexclaw Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Hexclaw Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">2</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(40-50)% increased Global [[Critical Strike Chance]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The Hunter faced the First One<br>and notched his final arrow.<br>The First One bared its fangs<br>and savoured its final breath.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Breakrib Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Breakrib Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">1</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(20-30)% increased Global [[Physical Damage]]</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">I stood among the stones<br>And called out to the First Ones;<br>That with tooth and mighty claw,<br>They should tear our enemies asunder.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Monkey Twins Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Monkey Twins Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">3</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(5-8)% increased Area of Effect</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">The first ones marked their hunting grounds<br>with blood and piss.<br>We have tried to paint our future in words.<br>Now we shall paint with inks of savagery.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Three Hands Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Three Hands Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">3</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">Gain (6-12)% of [[Physical Damage]] as Extra Damage of a random Element</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">We breed thoughts of single mind,<br>fashion tools of single purpose.<br>While the First Ones bring to bear<br>anything that the wildlands provide.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Rotfeather Talisman
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Rotfeather Talisman<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Talisman Tier: <em class="tc -value">3</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">(25-35)% increased Damage</span><span class="group tc -mod"><em class="tc -corrupted">Corrupted</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Death met with the First Ones<br>and demanded they hunt with mercy.<br>For while pain might delight the mind,<br>it does not fill the belly.<br>- The Wolven King</span></span></span>

title.name: Iron Ring
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Iron Ring<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod">Adds 1 to 4 [[Physical Damage]] to [[Attack|Attacks]]</span></span></span>

title.name: Chain Belt
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Chain Belt<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod">+(9-20) to maximum [[Energy Shield]]</span></span></span>

title.name: Rustic Sash
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Rustic Sash<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod">(12-24)% increased Global [[Physical Damage]]</span></span></span>

title.name: Paua Amulet
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Paua Amulet<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod">(20-30)% increased [[Mana]] Regeneration Rate</span></span></span>

title.name: Coral Amulet
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Coral Amulet<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod">Regenerate (2-4) [[Life]] per second</span></span></span>

title.name: Coral Ring
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Coral Ring<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod">+(20-30) to maximum [[Life]]</span></span></span>

title.name: Paua Ring
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Paua Ring<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod">+(20-30) to maximum [[Mana]]</span></span></span>

title.name: Lapis Amulet
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Lapis Amulet<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Requires Level <em class="tc -value"><em class="tc -value">5</em></em></span><span class="group tc -mod">+(20-30) to [[Intelligence]]</span></span></span>

title.name: Jade Amulet
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Jade Amulet<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Requires Level <em class="tc -value"><em class="tc -value">5</em></em></span><span class="group tc -mod">+(20-30) to [[Dexterity]]</span></span></span>

title.name: Amber Amulet
title.html: <span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Amber Amulet<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Requires Level <em class="tc -value"><em class="tc -value">5</em></em></span><span class="group tc -mod">+(20-30) to [[Strength]]</span></span></span>

title.name: Sapphire Ring
